alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aransas, northeastern San Patricio and south central Refugio Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayside, or 8 miles northeast of Taft, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bayside and Bonnie View. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 632 and 634. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
